overview:
Bob brings over twenty-five years experience in the global water and wastewater industry. Prior to joining MIOX, he held the position of Global Director Strategic Marketing for Siemens Water Technologies. During his career in the water industry he has held various positions in management, marketing, sales, and business development with Siemens, USFilter, Wheelabrator Technologies & Westates Carbon.

Bob holds a B.S. in Chemical Engineering from Drexel University and currently resides in the Philadelphia area.
